Quality Service

01

Design

From conceptual sketches to detailed plans, we ensure that every aspect of your project is carefully considered, resulting in a design that combines functionality, beauty, and innovation. Whether you are looking to transform your space or embark on a new venture, our design experts are here to make your dreams a reality.

02

Build

From the foundations to the finishing touches, our construction team is dedicated to delivering quality workmanship, on-time completion, and adherence to budget. We take pride in our ability to turn architectural visions into beautiful outcomes. We never cut corners and always aim for the highest quality finish.

03

Maintain

Once your project is complete, our commitment to your satisfaction does not end. Our maintenance services ensure that your investment retains its beauty and functionality for years to come. Whether it is routine upkeep or repairs, We are always here to help. Quality maintenance to extend home lifetime.

Kitchen Tiling

Kitchen tiling and splashbacks regularly require much more expert thought for the best final pattern. Being in the centre of your home, it is important to have your kitchen tiling done professionally.

Kitchen Tiling Splashwalls

Bathroom Tiling

I have completed hundreds of bathroom tiling projects from full renovations to small service / repair jobs. Get in contact for great bathroom tiling work guarenteed.

Bathroom Tiling Screeding

Pool Tiling

One of my tiling specialities is my ability to work out complex pool tiling curves and areas. Making sure all edges have been deeply planned out for the best final product.

Pool Tiling Waterproofing

Floor Tiling

We're dedicated to transforming your spaces with the beauty and functionality of quality floor tiling. From timeless elegance to contemporary flair, style that stands the test of time.

Floor Tiling Kitchen Tiling

Expertise

Transform your Gold Coast bathroom with our top-tier bathroom tiling services, delivered by expert tiling contractors. Our meticulous craftsmanship ensures water-resistant and visually stunning results that elevate your space.

More Info

Our Gold Coast kitchen tiling services, performed by experienced tiling contractors, bring style and longevity to your culinary space. Explore our range of designs to find the perfect fit for your kitchen, delivered with precision and expertise.

More Info

More Info

We specialize in enhancing your spaces through the artistry and durability of premium floor tiling. Whether you desire classic sophistication or modern aesthetics, our expert services are tailored to not only match your personal style but also deliver enduring quality that will serve you well for years to come.

More Info

Elevate your Gold Coast property with exquisite stone tiling, professionally executed by our tiling contractors. Our installations seamlessly blend natures beauty with your indoor or outdoor areas, providing both aesthetics and durability.

More Info

Discover the enduring charm of Gold Coast slate tiling, installed by our skilled tiling contractors. Our expertise combines rustic allure with longevity, making your outdoor spaces as visually appealing as they are robust.

More Info

Water intrusion and environmental wear and tear can compromise the integrity of your property over time. At Golden Tiling, our mission is to help you preserve your spaces by providing top-notch waterproofing and protective solutions.

More Info

At A N Golden Tiling, we bring our passion for precision and dedication to quality to every aspect of our services, including screeding. Our screeding services provide the essential foundation for flawless tiling installations, ensuring a level and stable surface that enhances both the aesthetics and durability of your tiling project. With years of experience and expertise, we take pride in delivering screeding solutions that meet the highest industry standards, making us your trusted partner for achieving a seamless and long-lasting tiling experience.

About

I have been a tiler all my life and since moving to Australia over 15 years ago, I have been running my own tiling business on the Gold Coast. If you're looking for someone with the experience to handle any job, I am happy to help. Highly expereienced with all forms of tiling from showers, bathrooms, pools, stone, slate, and any other tiling needs. - Alex Nora
